releaseNotes:
1.1.0 2022-11-05 - Alarm events are registered upon confirmation from the device only; added switch capability; added Tone capability (beep command); combined Tuya commands; default settings are restored after the beep command; added capability 'Chime'; setVolume; volumeUp, volumeDown; playSound; beepVolume; playSoundVolume; playSoundDuration; unschedule() is called when preferences are updated.
